description:
<p>RESUSCITATION LEAD 8A<br />18.75 hours per week</p>
<p>The Resuscitation Lead will be a clinical Nurse , ODP or other suitable AHP who is proficient in looking after critically ill and deteriorating patient, utilising clinical expertise and specialist knowledge to deliver high quality evidence/research based care to the patient. They will act as a role model providing support, education and effective communication between the MDT.<br /><br />The Resuscitation Lead will be responsible for trust wide planning, organisation and implementation of training, for ensuring all WCFT employees are trained in life support techniques to an appropriate level, including the creation and delivery of bespoke sessions and to oversee and implement smooth running of in-house Immediate Life Support (ILS).<br /><br />The Resuscitation Lead will act as a role model to ensure standards are being maintained, evaluated and continually improved. The applicant must be an ALS Instructor or recently been nominated as an ALS instructor <br /><br />It is essential that the post holder has the ability to work a flexible shift pattern monday to friday to cover the service.</p>
title: Resuscitation Lead
